about_the_game:
NothingDOG-《Having a free little dog》-Public welfare soundtrack album

About this:


There are thousands and thousands of dogs in the world. Some dogs want to conquer the stars and the sea in their warm beds, while some puppies just want to get out of the iron cage. Someone asked the dog why did you put on a cloak? The dog said: "I just want to live my life freely. "


NothingDOG-《Having a free little dog》-Public welfare soundtrack album to bring new dogs, In a thousand times of anxiety,this is the rest of life that the dog hands over to you a thousand and one times.

-New DLC dogs
-DLC Pure Music Enjoyments
-NothingDOG's Blessing

-100% of the revenue from this DLC will be donated to "Stray Animals" related public welfare through authoritative charitable organizations.
